document_data.mainbody:
Justal Iroon was a mage at some point before the turn of the 9 century DR.
At some point before the turn of the 9 century, when Justal Iroon was already an old man, he was slain by Radellus, who fancied his tower near Sreve for his own. Radellus flung Justal Iroons smoking body the length of Sreves main street it was then whisked into the millpond, killing all its fish. Unknown to either mage, a young Kurtal snuck into the tower and stole three of Justals spellbooks during the exchange of spells.
